topic.title: Human by Design - Presented by Deus Ex Mankind Divided 2016 (Amazon RIPPED)
topic.body:
Since i don't have a seedbox and zeronet doesn't have a site to host files or mega.co.nz on here so...

https://mega.nz/#F!looy3JpC!nhwVvOOgygs68rwSYBs39g

+------- SUMMARY -------+
What does it mean to be human? Human by Design examines this question through the lens of 12 extraordinary people who are at the intersection of technology and imagination. Inspired by the futuristic themes and ethical questions within the video game Deus Ex: Mankind Divided, this real world journey introduces the leading minds in bionics who are redefining what it means to be human.

If anyone even into Cyberpunk or Documentaries

2_12yaKkoqVKBUi66uB5pYXamWguKFaWdDnx.body: Go google DNSCAT2, SSH tunnel, iVPN  or VPN over DNS .. That + tor + your vpn/proxies or whatever.. Proxychains, Proxifier.. Tons of ways to bypass that man. If you trying to make it public with that bit.no.com domain use this instead --> http://ngrok.com

1_1JgHfDK4eojCkVZHKey9hiMAcAc9mxMUK2.body:
> [tkarita](#comment_138_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): ZeroMail 2 and NullFolder use webtorrent, which uses WebRTC to transfer files from one browser window to another.  It stops working if the sender closes their window or even refreshes the page.  Coming from ZeroMail, one probably expects that the file sharing would store files in the same way that messages are stored.  It might be easier to create a new site to host your file than to arrange for both participants to be available at the same time.

Ugh.. another dude with his webrtc.. udp... = real IP / demasked . I vote for transferring files via DNS (see DNScat2 )

Dark Market. Better zeronet search engine and probably tons others besides just movies and tv series. I don't see Animes and whatnot. There's room for improvement and one that doesn't lead to content.js can't be download or index.html not found. Not everyone here has a seedbox nor have any time to webtorrent their videos to be streamed at KopyKate. 

When it comes down to Dating Sites, think of the end users that's gonna use them, are they even savvy enough to even run ZeroNet? I doubt so let alone run this whole thing on their mobile.
I've contacted http://fmovies.to/ owner. Let's see what he thinks of Zeronet

Lel job listing. I guess you missed the salted hashes etc. When you SQLi you have access to their _ENTIRE_ site after dropping a shell :P Simply say these buggers are invested by Google yet can't even pay shit or least be responsible to their supporters. Chinese, good at marketing, good at cloning other's work but shit in security. Ha..
